title: Stunning 2BR/2BA Apartment with Waterfront View and Private Balcony
posting_body: Finest Waterside Living in Marina Del Rey!
This two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment at Panay Way Marina-Capri Apartments features an open floor plan with a large patio.
Take in a waterfront view through the large windows while dining in your eat-in kitchen.
Available homes even come with fireplaces and washer and dryer hookups.
Large walk-in closets help to keep you organized.
There is even a fully equipped kitchen, which comes loaded with appliances.
Residents of the community enjoy access to desirable amenities such as covered parking, a fitness center, and laundry facilities.
The pool, spa, and sauna offer a place to relax, while twenty-four-hour maintenance assistance provides you with some peace of mind.
Head to nearby Venice Beach to enjoy the sun and sand, or visit the variety of shopping and dining options in Fisherman's Wharf and Abbot Kinney Boulevard.
Come in today to learn more about this pet-friendly community.
13953 Panay Way Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
